name: RUUT Technologies, Inc
description: Developer of an investment platform intended to bridge the gap between Mexicans with a digital banking account and people with a personal investment account for non-investors. The company offers a simple, intuitive, and commission-free beginner-friendly product, with investment advisory, newsfeed, and an impact investment tracker, enabling investors with a simple, low-cost, and long-term holding incentive structure.
one_liner: Developer of an investment platform intended to bridge the gap between Mexicans with a digital banking account and people with a personal investment account for non-investors.
